results.name: Self-inverse permutation of natural numbers, "Blue code" conjugated by A156552 and its inverse: a(n) = A005940(1+A193231(A156552(n))).

program: A193231(n) = { my(x='x); subst(lift(Mod(1, 2)*subst(Pol(binary(n), x), x, 1+x)), x, 2) }; \\ From A193231
